ssot__LoyaltyProgramCurrency__dlm.name: Loyalty Program Currency
ssot__LoyaltyProgramCurrency__dlm.description: The Loyalty Program Currency DMO represents the value or currency that the loyalty program offers to customers.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyExpirationExtensionModelId.description: A reference ID to the program’s currency model, for example, the rewards don’t expire or expire on a certain date.

ssot__CurrencyExpirationModelId__c.description: A reference ID to the values of the currency expiration model, such as fixed or activity based.

ssot__CurrencyTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to methods of accruing value in loyalty program, for example miles, points, or a hard currency such as US dollars.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExpirationPeriodFrequencyNumber__c.description: The frequent currency units expire in relation to the unit of measure (UOM).

ssot__ExpirationPeriodFrequencyTimeUOM__.description: The time period for how often currency such as points or miles expire.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

Expiration Period Frequency Time UOM sso.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the currency is being used.

ssot__IsPrimary__c.description: An indicator if the currency is the primary currency for the loyalty program.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LoyaltyProgramId__c.description: A reference ID to the loyalty program.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Loyalty Program Currency DMO.

ssot__LoyaltyTierGroupId__c.description: A reference ID to the tiers available in a loyalty program.

ssot__QualifyingPointEndDate__c.description: The date when currency stops being accrued.

ssot__QualifyingPointStartDate__c.description: The date when currency begins to be accrued.
